article.Heading: Tamil Nadu warns those charging rates beyond stipulated GST
article.Summary: "If anybody charges rates beyond GST, stern action will be taken against them," Finance Minister D Jayakumar told reporters here.
article.Body:
Tamil Nadu government today warned of "stern action" against those charging rates beyond the stipulated GST.

"If anybody charges rates beyond GST, stern action will be taken against them," Finance Minister D Jayakumar told reporters here.

He said action will also be taken if additional rates were charged for commodities exempted from the Goods and Services Tax (GST).

A complaint cell has been formed with state Commercial Taxes department for this purpose and people can inform the government on any GST related issues in this regard, he said.

Jayakumar also sought the people's cooperation in the matter.
